original_title: The Missing Piece: Mona Lisa, Her Thief, the True Story
overview: A man steals the Mona Lisa from the Louvre in 1911. His 84-year-old daughter thought he did it for patriotic reasons. A filmmaker spends more than 30 years trying to find the truth.
title: The Missing Piece: Mona Lisa, Her Thief, the True Story
